original_title: ’Yukithiya’ proves to be a drama: SJB MP
original_body_lines: Colombo, Jan. 22 (Daily Mirror)- Referring to the killing of five persons, including a political party leader in Belliatta thus morning, Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) MP Sujith Sanjaya Perera said the 'Yukthiya operation' has been proven to be a drama.
“A large scale operation is not needed if Acting IGP Deshabandu Tennekoon had carried out his duties effectively during his past years of service in the police," he said.
